name: buki buki!
description:
buki buki~!

Our submission for Ludum Dare 35 with the theme "Shapeshift". Play as a cute girl who shapeshifts into a bow and a shield to defeat her foes.

Thanks to Fertilab for the co-working space, Pacori coffee for the hookups!

Made in 72 hours.

music by ZBWmusic

programming by Cullen Dwyer

art by Britt Brady

Vote over here!
